data.name: api_feature_properties
data.marketing: Functionality that allows editing of manager's properties through the API
data.description: Functionality that allows editing of manager's properties through the API
data.author: Vince Wooll
data.change_log: v0.3 Modified how data is returned. v0.4 Added SET NAMES UTF8 v0.5 added room type images. v0.6 Fixed an issue caused by user profile changes when getting list of all property uids. v0.7 Removed endpoints that should exist in Site Structure. v0.8 Adjustment to remove Jomres version from its old setting. v0.9 French language file added v1.0 API plugins updated to work with updates to Jomres, and some tweaks for consistency. v1.1 Tweak to resolve a notice
